name: African Rally 2: Safari 3D Racing
description:
NEW RALLY CAR INCLUDED! The Rally Race is back with twice as many Safari Animals. The app now includes Elephants, Rhinos, Giraffes, Hippos, and Kudus. Rev up those rally engines and get racing.
EASIER TO RACE
Not as many checkpoints as the first African Rally race. But be sure and pass them all. Victory will be yours!
CUSTOMIZE YOUR RALLY CAR
Choose from many different options. Unlock new rally cars are you advance in the game
NOW UP TO 4 OPPONENTS
Race up to 4 other rally racers. They will keep you on your toes to stay ahead.
50 COURSES
Try to beat the best time in all the race tracks. They will get more and more challenging the more times you win the race.
ANIMALS!
We love our Safari animals. Elephants, Rhinos, Antelope, Giraffe, Zebras roaming around the race track. We bring you the best animals for the most fun racing experience.
PRIZES PRIZES!!
Win up to 16 DIfferent trophies for winning races. Try and collect all 16 Prizes.
REALISTIC 3D SAFARI GRAPHICS
We love the African Bush and we bring it straight to your favorite mobile device.
Please note: This app requires you to have the latest devices. It will work run slowly on older devices. This app will test the limits of even the more current devices. Have a great race!!
